data.title: Deliciousness
data.text: A true BBQ legend in old town Pearland. Dining in is cafeteria style selection. Beyond the tender and tasty BBQ the selection of sides and deserts is plentiful. The staff is always friendly and the restaurant is charming. When ordering take out the helpings are always perfect and just as tasty as dine-in. "Love some Central T" !

data.title: Great BBQ
data.text: We went for the first time this Saturday for lunch, and it was so packed that the line was doubled back and out the door.  We did not mind waiting, as there were plenty of open seats available. The food was awesome, and well worth the wait! The staff was very cheerful, never frustrated even though they were understaffed. Most definitely returning!

data.title: best bbq
data.text: the people are super nice and the food is terrific.  the chicken so tender and falls off the comes.  great flavor

owner_response.author: ruthmarie, Owner at Central Texas Style Barbecue, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Terry .... thank you so much! Really nice of you to take time to write this review. We really appreciate it! Thanks Ruth Leclere
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Legit.
data.text: The BBQ here is legit, but make sure to try the sides too. The broccoli casserole shouldn't be missed. You won't have room for dessert, so take some pecan pie with you for the road.

owner_response.author: ruthmarie, Owner at Central Texas Style Barbecue, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Sarah ... we really appreciate your nice comments this morning. So happy that you love the food!!!!! Come back soon and introduce yourself to me or my son Devon!thanks again ... Ruth Leclere
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: AAA+++
data.text: Best pork ribs ever. The brisket and spicy links are great. Don't miss the pineapple upside down cake!!

owner_response.author: ruthmarie, Owner at Central Texas Style Barbecue, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Wow thanks so much for the nice review ... we really appreciate you taking time to write it ... thanks from all of us .. Ruth Leclere
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Central Texas Style BBQ in Pearland
data.text:
My Wife and I had dinner Sunday evening at our favorite Barbecue restaurant in the area: South Texas Style Barbecue in Pearland.
As always we found the Sliced Beef Brisket and Pork Ribs to be excellent, tasty and juicy; and the sides abundant and tasty, The New Potatoes are my favorite and are almost worth a meal by themselves!
Unfortunately, the line waiting to be served was longer than usual possibly do to a recent favorable article in the local papers; but it also seemed to move slower than usual. Also, it seemed like the meat portions were somewhat smaller than in the past, which along with the higher prices for the plates might be signs or symptoms of the eceonomy and the higher beef & pork costs. Still, it's the very best BBQ place anywhere around the area!

data.title: Ok BBQ
data.text: The food is not really too bad but the space to order the food is very crowded.  The seating is quaint with lots of different type of tables, etc.  The restaurant is older but really only bad thing is the area/space you have to wait to place your order.

data.title: Pearlands old favorite
data.text: CTBBQ is the old favorite in P-town and lots of ppl still prefer it over the other places, more of a family feel to the, its been there forever

owner_response.author: ruthmarie, Owner at Central Texas Style Barbecue, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks so much for this great review. We have been here forever....lol 47 years and going strong... We love our customers and really appreciate your kind words. Thank you .. Ruth Leclere
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Food and Decor
data.text: My wife and I visited Central on a holiday evening (Labor day). As usual, the BBQ Chicken and Smoked Ham were delicious. We also normally get the brisket or baked potato with sliced/chopped beef. We are used to longer waits due to the popularity of the place. On the bright side however, is that there is all kinds of neat things to look at on and along the walls that makes the wait seem not so long.

owner_response.author: ruthmarie, Owner at Central Texas Style Barbecue, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for your review! I am so happy that you enjoyed your food and YES there is a lot to look at on the walls lol!!!!thanks for your patience on a holiday .we hurry as fast as we can! Thanks again .. Ruth Leclere
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Still the Best
data.text: We have lived in Pearland for 14 years and have been customers of Central Texas throughout our time here.  The meat options are delicious, our family favorites are the smoked sausage and the smoked turkey.  But, to be honest, I'm all about the sides when it comes to barbeque--my husband is the meat eater.  They probably have the best macaroni and cheese from anywhere and I just love their yams.  If you want cooked-from-scratch food with amazing sides, this is the place.  We have used their food for catering large events as well and it is always a hit.  One thing to note is that 99% of the time, we get our food as take-out.  It's grate for family events, etc.  Also, my personal preference is to not eat inside the restaurant (though, the décor is super fun) because I end up smelling like smoked barbeque for the rest of the day.  I plan on being a return customer for years to come.

owner_response.author: ruthmarie, Owner at Central Texas Style Barbecue, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Your review put a big smile on my face this morning!!! Thank you so much!!!  We have "old school" pits (no thermometer,lots of wood,)so you definitely get the smell of smoke when you come in!!!! When we first open we had only a few side orders but as the years went on we added and added and added so now it's so many to choose from and honestly I love all of them .we take a lot of pride in our sides... The Mac and cheese is grandkid approved lol I have 8 in total!and the yams are better than dessert to me! My son and daughter in law make the pies and cakes . I make the cobbler from a recipe I learned in homemaking class one million years ago ! Anyway I just want to say thanks from me and my family for your kind words!!!ruth Leclere
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Filled the gap.
data.text: The lunch special was a good deal for the price, but the meat was just ok.  Not a lot of flavor in the meat.  We were hungry and at first it tasted good, later lots of burping.

data.title: The Best BBQ besides my Dad's
data.text: My family moved to Pearland in 1972 and soon after we discovered Central Texas Style Barbecue.  I have been going there for more than 44 years and I will continue to go there.  It is a great family owned and operated restaurant.  I have known the owners for many many years.  They very nice people and take care to only serve great food.  The food is fantastic.  I cannot say enough good things about it.

owner_response.author: ruthmarie, Owner at Central Texas Style Barbecue, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Randy .... You are a sweetheart!!!!we will happily take second to your dad!!!! That's the way it should be ... We appreciate you being such a great and loyal customer !!!!! Thanks again ... Ruth Leclere
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Best in Pearland
data.text: Central Texas Bbq has been a great local establishment for years. Usually very quick service, lots of seating and the food is incredible!

owner_response.author: ruthmarie, Owner at Central Texas Style Barbecue, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Brian ... We are so grateful that you like our food. We do try our best to hurry so people don't have to wait too long!thank you for taking your time to write this really nice review! Ruth Leclere
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Step Back in Time
data.text: Just off the Railroad Track, this place is a step back in time.  The food is great, and the night I went there they had a live guitarist singing country tunes.  I especially liked the brisket.

owner_response.author: ruthmarie, Owner at Central Texas Style Barbecue, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Hi ....thank you so much for taking time to write this! We have been here 47 years and have 4 generations currently working here.we are so glad you like our food and the entertainment!he plays Friday and Saturday ! Come back soon! Thanks Ruth Leclere
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Nice place
data.text:
Good place for BBQ nothing to write home about. Does not have as long a line as the new place down the street does, sometimes there is a line but usually 10-15min wait. They may want to add some more help on the serving line!! The potato salad is great
BBQ is good enough. Price is to high for what your getting.

owner_response.author: ruthmarie, Owner at Central Texas Style Barbecue, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Hi Wes... Try getting the lunch special... One meat .. 2 sides .. Dessert and a drink for 12.95 .its a great deal! Glad you like our potato salad ... We make it fresh at least twice a day!thank you for taking time to review! Lunch special from11:00-3:00 Ruth Leclere
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: BEST Barbecue place in Pearland!
data.text: Everything they have on their menu is Delish! If you're in the area, this is a must eat at place and service is phenomenal!

owner_response.author: ruthmarie, Owner at Central Texas Style Barbecue, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Gloria ... Wow ! Loved getting up this morning and reading your sweet review! Thank you so much from myself and my family!!!!ruth Leclere
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Central Texas
data.text: The very best bar b que in the Pearland Texas area. The meat on the ribs falls of the bones. The brisket is as tender as a mother's love. Don't leave without having some peach cobbler.

owner_response.author: ruthmarie, Owner at Central Texas Style Barbecue, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking time to write this !!!! We are so grateful for all of our good reviews and we work really hard to be consistent ! So happy you like the food! Thanks Ruth Leclere
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: BBQ
data.text: Food was moist and tasty, live entertainment while I was there, good size portions for the price.  Try the chocolate cake

owner_response.author: ruthmarie, Owner at Central Texas Style Barbecue, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks Michael !!! We really appreciate your kind words!!!!take care Ruth Leclere
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Local favorite only for loyalty
data.text: I have tried several in the area and do not think Central is trying as hard as they used to. They have folks that come because they are loyal. It is not bad food but, not memorable. I like the sides better than the 'cue. The desserts are good as well. Prices are decent. Easy to find, parking can be tricky.

owner_response.author: ruthmarie, Owner at Central Texas Style Barbecue, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Hi thank you so much for the feedback.im glad you like the sides and dessert. I promise you we try very hard every day to do the best we can . If you have any specific recommendations please call me any morning at the restaurant . If I have stepped out for a moment my son Devon will be there.thank you for taking the time to write the review.we just finished upgrading the parking lot so hope that helps.sincerely Ruth Leclere
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Texas Style BBQ
data.text: Great BBQ with nice sized portions.  The Blueberry cobbler was a prefect finish to a great meal.  Highly recommend.

owner_response.author: ruthmarie, Owner at Central Texas Style Barbecue, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for your kind words. So glad you enjoyed your barbecue and cobbler!!!!i got that cobbler recipe from my homemaking class teacher Mrs. Little  47 years ago and it still is delicious today.thanks Ruth Leclere
owner_response.title: Owner Response
